body:
Comment 1: 
If they don't take up any memory and you make an array of them
then &x[1] == &x[2] which can get very strange.  So we require them
to have a non-zero size.  

The size is 4 bytes instead of 1 because of struct alignment not being
as minimal as it should be (issue #482).
